transcription:
Hello?

Sir, ye Manoj ji se baat ho rahi hai?

Haanji.

Sir, ye aapki koi kirana wala ki shop hai kya?

Haan. Haanji sir.

Sir, ye main Badho Bharat ki taraf se baat kar raha tha. Ye aapne apne phone pe Badho Bharat app phone download kiya hoga, is wajah se main aapko call kar raha hu, hai na sir?

Haanji.

Ji ji. Toh apni shop pe sir ye oil waghera rakhte hai kya sir?

Haanji sir, ye pansari ka rakhte hain.

Kiska sir?

Pansari.

Accha, accha, pansari. To ye jaise rath waghera ka nahi rakhte hain sir? Rath hua, Vanaspati oil aapke..

Nahi sir, nahi ji, rath nahi rakhte.

Accha, to isme kya hai ki abhi offer chal raha tha.

Nahi abhi to filhal nahi dalna hai abhi filhal.

Accha accha.

To isme kya hai ki Vanaspati oil pe offer chal raha tha. 500 ml wala Rs 119 ki MRP wala Rs 72 ka pad raha hai sir aapko, hai na sir?

Ji ji.

Sir abhi to filhal nahi. Sir abhi to maal bhara hai dukaan pe.

Chaliye theek hai. Agar aap chahein to ek chota sa order laga ke dekhiye iska sir. Minimum order jo Rs 2000 tak ka hai, cash on delivery ka order hai sir.

Theek hai sir, theek hai.

Theek hai.

Theek sir, theek hai. Agar aap chahein to main laga du, laga du yahan se kya order aapka?

Nahi sir abhi nahi, abhi sir abhi maal bhara hai, abhi nahi.

Chaliye theek hai sir, theek hai.

Okay.

Theek hai sir.

questions_and_answers.label: How long was the call?

details.instructions: Only answer the number while taking minutes as the unit. Like if the call duration was 5.3 minutes then answer the round-off integer that is 5, if it was 1 hr 10 mins then answer 70, don't write the unit minutes in the answer.

questions_and_answers.label: What feedback related to app experience was given by the user to our calling executive?

details.answer: The user did not provide any feedback related to the app experience. He only confirmed that he had downloaded the Badho Bharat app. The remainder of the conversation was about his current stock and not wanting to place an order, with no mention of the app's usability or features
details.instructions: Write an overall summary of the feedback given by the user in maximum 100 words.
